post.Title: xkcd - comic genius
post.Content:
I've been having a good laugh at the comics on xkcd. Some of my favourites include:

  • http://xkcd.com/c168.html
  • http://xkcd.com/c166.html
  • http://xkcd.com/c165.html
  • http://xkcd.com/c163.html
  • http://xkcd.com/c156.html
  • http://xkcd.com/c155.html
  • http://xkcd.com/c153.html
  • http://xkcd.com/c151.html
  • http://xkcd.com/c149.html

Enjoy :-)
